name: United RPMS
tagline: Repository with additional software for Fedora 24 and Fedora 25
body:
***

### Welcome to UnitedRPMs Project. We maintain the multimedia and other software and addons which is missing in original repositories of [Fedora](https://getfedora.org/). Play and work with multimedia, use Web without problems. ### How to enable UnitedRPMs repository in your system [The instructions](https://github.com/UnitedRPMs/unitedrpms.github.io/blob/master/README.md) - **don't forget** to import the GPG key! ### List of most popular software in our repository * `Vlc` * `Mpv` * `GNOME-mpv` * `kodi` * `openshot` * `Chromium (all multimedia HTML5 content, flash player)` * `Kdenlive` * `Handbrake` * `VirtualBox` * `OBS-studio` * `GNOME Internet Radio Locator program` * `Smplayer` * `Foobnix` * `Idjc` * `Cmus` * `Minidlna` * `mplayer` * `Gstreamer codecs` * `freetype-freeworld (with subpixel rendering)` * `N1 (the extensible, open source mail app)` **For developers** * `atom (hackable text editor for the 21st Century)` * `lighttable (the next generation code editor)` * `brackets (modern, open source text editor that understands web design)` ### All packages with updates and last added [Repoview](http://unitedrpms.sourceforge.net/x86_64/repoview/) ### Authors and Contributors Fedora United was born as a [Google+ community](https://plus.google.com/communities/109631651893367781759) made by David Vásquez whose purpose is to unite all distributions based on Fedora; so he updated and made in free time several basic packages for rawhide purposes. Various people liked it and the three crazy people, Sérgio Basto, Pavlo Rudyi and David Vasquez created the UnitedRPMs Project. ### What is the purpose of this project? Well, maintain a solution for people with unstable Fedora distributions, increase technical skills, create a [Copr](https://copr.fedoraproject.org/)-like build system for package with licensing problems. UnitedRPMs it's not a branch maintenance of other projects, it is only a road to give the user a fast solution without fool bureaucracy where everyone can help. ### Why UnitedRPMs not contributes to RPMFusion? Our models of development are very different. We believe in flexible ecosystem where everyone can be helpful for the community without stupid bureaucracy and didn't be an alone rider. Some of our packages were reworked from RPMFusion and can be used by everyone; unofficially as extended rpmfusion rawhide. List of all contributors you can find [here](https://github.com/orgs/UnitedRPMs/people), as specs and source code is also available on Github. Except Sérgio Basto which is a RPMFusion contributor and like to think this project is an extension of RPMFusion. ### Support or Contact Having trouble with any package or Fedora United repository? Need some software? Want to submit your package? Check out our [latest issues](https://github.com/UnitedRPMs/packages/issues), [list of packages](https://github.com/UnitedRPMs), [Wiki](https://github.com/UnitedRPMs/packages/wiki) and we’ll help you sort it out. Don't forget to subscribe to our [Google+ group](https://plus.google.com/communities/109631651893367781759)! ***
